title: Versioning details
description: The object contains details about a resource version

version.title: versionId
version.description: The version number of a resource. The property contains the last known version of the resource.

lastUpdater.description: The object reference object of the user that last updated the resource.

lastUpdatedDate.title: lastUpdatedDate
lastUpdatedDate.description: The date when the given version has been created.
